installation.script:

apt install -y git make gcc curl tar

cd

ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "amd64" || echo "arm64")

echo ${ARCH}

curl -O https://dl.google.com/go/go1.19.2.linux-${ARCH}.tar.gz
ls
tar xvf go1.19.2.linux-${ARCH}.tar.gz

chown -R root:root ./go
mv go /usr/local

export GOPATH=$HOME/work
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:$GOPATH/bin

cd /mnt/server

mkdir yarr_source
git clone https://github.com/nkanaev/yarr.git yarr_source

cd yarr_source

export CGO_ENABLED=1
sed -i -r "s/amd64/$ARCH/g" makefile

make build_linux    # -> _output/linux/yarr

cp _output/linux/yarr ../yarr
cd ../

rm -rf yarr_source

touch auth.conf

chmod +x yarr

echo "Install complete"
